subject: Re: My 1st test session = tonight & tomorow!
author: psi_research
full_text:
Good luck, I'll be in my car going to meet Randy who is here visiting 
right now. Maybe I should hack my Audi radio. -Bill


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" 
<Ticket_to_Heaven@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Frank & All,  I am feeling it's the right time for me to do my 1st 
test session with the RS Hack, so, it's about 8:50 pm (L.A. time) and 
I'm thinking at about 10 PM (L.A. time) to tune-in and record whatever 
wants to come to be recorded.  I hope some of you (i.e. Bruce) will let 
the entities/Spirits know that I will be testing in about an hour from 
now! Thanks!! =Judy=
>
